DEFENSE.description: Block up to {level} Physical Damage and if you do, remove that much Defense.

POISON.description: Take {level} Poison Damage at the start of your turn.

REGENERATION.description: Restore {level} Health at the start of your turn.

EVASION.description: {evasion_probability} chance to take no damage from an incoming attack.

HIDDEN.description: {crit_probability} chance to deal double damage when you attack.

PARALYZE.description: You cannot play any cards except Consumables.

FRENZY.description: Cards you play have none of their effects except dealing damage.

CALM.description: Cards you play deal no damage.

RESISTANCE_PHYSICAL.description: Take {percent_change} less damage from Physical attacks.

RESISTANCE_FIRE.description: Take {percent_change} less damage from Fire attacks.

RESISTANCE_FROST.description: Take {percent_change} less damage from Frost attacks.

RESISTANCE_SHOCK.description: Take {percent_change} less damage from Shock attacks.

RESISTANCE_POISON.description: Take {percent_change} less damage from Poison attacks.

WEAKNESS_PHYSICAL.description: Take {percent_change} more damage from Physical attacks.

WEAKNESS_FIRE.description: Take {percent_change} more damage from Fire attacks.

WEAKNESS_FROST.description: Take {percent_change} more damage from Frost attacks.

WEAKNESS_SHOCK.description: Take {percent_change} more damage from Shock attacks.

WEAKNESS_POISON.description: Take {percent_change} more damage from Poison attacks.

FORTIFY_STRENGTH.description: Weapons you play deal {percent_change} more damage.

DAMAGE_STRENGTH.description: Weapons you play deal {percent_change} less damage.

FORTIFY_ENDURANCE.description: Armor you play provides {percent_change} more Defense.

DAMAGE_ENDURANCE.description: Armor you play provides {percent_change} less Defense.

FORTIFY_WILLPOWER.description: Spells you play deal {percent_change} more damage.

DAMAGE_WILLPOWER.description: Spells you play deal {percent_change} less damage.

FORTIFY_SPEED.description: Draw {level} more cards at the start of your turn.

DAMAGE_SPEED.description: Draw {level} fewer cards at the start of your turn.

FORTIFY_LONG_BLADE.description: Your Long Blades cost {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_BLUNT_WEAPON.description: Your Blunt Weapons cost {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_SHORT_BLADE.description: Your Short Blades cost {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_MARKSMAN.description: Your Marksman Weapons cost {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_LIGHT_ARMOR.description: Your Light Armor costs {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_MEDIUM_ARMOR.description: Your Medium Armor costs {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_HEAVY_ARMOR.description: Your Heavy Armor costs {level} less Stamina.

FORTIFY_ALTERATION.description: Your Alteration Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

FORTIFY_CONJURATION.description: Your Conjuration Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

FORTIFY_DESTRUCTION.description: Your Destruction Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

FORTIFY_ILLUSION.description: Your Illusion Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

FORTIFY_MYSTICISM.description: Your Mysticism Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

FORTIFY_RESTORATION.description: Your Restoration Spells costs {level} less Magicka.

REFLECT.description: Block up to {level} non-Physical damage, and if you do, deal that much damage to the attacker.

SPELL_ABSORPTION.description: Block up to {level} non-Physical damage, and if you do, gain that many points of Fortify Intelligence.

DISEASE.description: You cannot play more than 4 cards per turn.

BLIGHT.description: You cannot play more than 2 cards per turn.

LEVITATE.description: Average the costs of the cards in your hand.

SLOWFALLING.description: You no longer discard your remaining cards at the end of your turn.

WATER_WALKING.description: Cards you play that would go to the Discard Pile go on top of your Deck instead.

SWIFT_SWIM.description: When you draw your hand, you may discard up to {level} cards then draw that many cards.

WATER_BREATHING.description: When you would draw your hand, instead select up to {level} cards from your Discard Pile to add to your hand. Then draw the rest of your cards.
